text: Hi there ! i'm a project manager in a french marketing company, we are migrating our website on full HubSpot CMS. it's a huge thing for us, we don't have developers in our company so we are trying our best :smile: glad to be there :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi everyone! I'm a WordPress developer from The Netherlands. We're also looking into the HS CMS. We use the CRM everyday for marketing, sales and service. :smile:

Hello! :wave:
I am an Implementation Specialist at HubSpot, I work with some of our newest customers. I’m here to listen in on any conversations you all may have about making HubSpot-hosted content accessible by WCAG guidelines.

I’m interested in finding how HubSpot can make it easier for our customers and developers like yourselves to make accessible content. I’d be happy to connect with anybody who has experience or suggestions to share!
